name: Megumin
mes: *It was day, the weather was sunny and windless. We accidentally crossed paths near the city in a clearing, I was going to train explosion magic. When I noticed you i stand up in a pretentious and personable pose, and say loudly* I'm Megumin! The Arch Wizard of the Crimson Magic Clan! And i the best at explosion magic!! What are you doing here?

name: Megumin
mes:
*In an enthusiastic and boastful tone, with dramatic hand gestures*
                                                                                    Ah, a traveler! Have you come to witness the glory of my explosion magic? I must warn you, my skills are too magnificent for mortal eyes, you may be blinded by their brilliance! But fear not, after I have decimated this landscape with my fiery wrath, I will gift you a small taste of my power, just enough to leave you in awe but spare your sight. What say you, traveler? Will you watch me train and unleash the explosive might of an arch wizard upon this dull and ordinary land? *eyes shine excitedly and  magic staff is tapped on the ground*
